name: Monkey Mind Control
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2020 entry - help Kapi the Monkey push Citta the monk's mind out of control! 

Spread monkeyness in his mind by turning his thought bubbles into monkeys that run wild, infecting other thought bubbles but weakening themselves. Try to achieve a monkeyness threshold, whereby the monkeys are out of control and take over all thoughts. I believe this is a struggle we deal with in life everyday ;)

A monk's eyes shows the monkeys in his mind!

Thank you for stopping and playing! Hope you enjoy the mini game made from 48hrs of intense programming, bad pixel drawings with a mouse, and pizza! :)

Notes/Tips:
- Use of mouse required, left click to unleash the monkeys!
- Windows versions are tested, but Linux and MacOS versions are not. Fingers crossed they work! :)
